overview:
Web and Mobile Applications Engineer / Systems Architect with experience on Telecom Market, specially with Voice Over IP (VoIP) Platforms ( SIP, IAX, H.323, MGCP, SCCP ), advanced Telecom Protocols ( SS7 ), integration and development of hybrid systems both with TDM and VoIP protocols using Linux and Asterisk with Web Interfaces for Administration developed using Python, PHP, Ruby and Javascript ( AJAX & Comet ) Technologies.

Vast experience on UI and UX design for web applications, web server load balance, high availability and mobile development.

Experience on Advanced Web Application Patterns, CSS3, Javascript, HTML5, WebApp Unit tests, COMET and AJAX, JSON, JSON-P, RPC, XML and overall Webservices. Now, caught on the light of Node.js, npm and NoSQL Databases like MongoDB, CouchDB and Redis. Vast experience acting as a System Administration for Multi-Server Mission Critical Datacenter Management and Real-time Monitoring Software Development on Linux, UNIX and BSD Platforms.

Mobile UI / UX and Mobile Applications engineer for both Android and iOS (iPhone / iPad), specially using Appcelerator Titanium. Nominated one of the Appcelerator’s Titanium Titans due to early adoption and great experience on the platform.

Now, entrepreneur.
